TopicTitle: One sentence you could say to annoy an entire fan base?

Articles.Content: Star Wars and Star Trek should do a crossover... If the Stormtroopers can't hit anything, do the Redshirts still all die?
Kirk wasn't so great!

I think Disney taking over Star Wars is a good thing.
One hopes they'll take over Star Trek, too.
OT: Technically, as Star Trek is an ABC program and Disney owns ABC, they already own Star Trek
Star Trek was a CBS program. Still 100% Disney free!

I can't tell if you guys are playing the game or being serious.

BBC, dammit!

Anyway:

Why doesn't the Doctor just regenerate out of every situation? Wouldn't that make it so much easier?

First two quotes are game, second two are serious. Star Trek was a CBS/Paramount Production, though the BBC (and many other networks) later carried it.

Alien Resurrection is the best of the Alien movies, Wynona Ryder made it way better than the stupid suspense-filled Alien or the silly action-packed Aliens. She totally saved it from still more of Sigourney Weaver's horrible acting.
Sherlock is cheesy and boring. Just like Doctor Who.
Half Life 2 stole the gravity gun from Garry's Mod.
The automatic transmission is superior to the manual transmission for all driving tasks.
The AI in NHL 15 on Pro mode is not overpowered!
So, Age of Ultron? Is that, like, the movie where you get to find out how old Ultron is?
Apple is just a super-expensive kind of mainstream food.
Not much translator are able to translate sanely this: i!i

Mass Effect has no storyline.

Battlefield 4 has crap graphics.

Interstellar had the worst scenario.
Captain America..? You mean Captain United States? Why does he get a whole Hemisphere?

`

Edited February 7, 2021 by LVL 9001

Red Iron Crown doesn't deserve to be a Moderator.

(I don't mean it!)

Kerbol Star Organizations or whatever it's called is unrealistic, just look at Minimus and dune!

Translation: "Kerbal space program is unrealistic, just look at minmus and duna!"
Who's Suki? (Avatar the Last Airbender reference)

6 pool? It takes 6 minutes to get fastest army in starcraft?

Edited January 15, 2015 by InterCity
Kerbal Space Programming isn't real programming! Quit mucking around with stuff for kids and learn something real like JavaScript or Haskell.
IRC is dead, it's all about Facetime and Skype now.
KSP devs suck for useing Unity.

xXxskrillexXx is da best!!!1!!

*musicians from all genres prepare their pitchforks and light their torches*
Female Kerbals.
All the MLP characters are the same, there's no difference between them.
Rightly Wrong ric, all the others mlp are far far more important than your own no misunderstood is possible.
